title: How to Beat Super Mario Bros. on the NES Quickly

steps.title: As the game begins, start running at full speed.
steps.content: As the game begins, start running at full speed. (As a rule of thumb, always be going at full speed!)

steps.title: Do not stop for the first Goomba to pass, jump from pipe to pipe to avoid every Goomba.
steps.content: Do not stop for the first Goomba to pass, jump from pipe to pipe to avoid every Goomba.

steps.title: Enter the 4th pipe that you encounter.
steps.content: Enter the 4th pipe that you encounter.

steps.title: Do not fuss over trying to pick up every coin inside the tunnel, exit as quickly as possible.
steps.content: Do not fuss over trying to pick up every coin inside the tunnel, exit as quickly as possible.

steps.title: After this keep to our rule of being “above the danger”* and finish the level without worrying about making a perfect jump to the flag.
steps.content: After this keep to our rule of being “above the danger”* and finish the level without worrying about making a perfect jump to the flag.

steps.title: Continue to run at full speed (This will be assumed from now on).
steps.content: Continue to run at full speed (This will be assumed from now on).

steps.title: Avoid the two Goombas by jumping over the “?”
steps.content: Avoid the two Goombas by jumping over the “?” blocks.

steps.title: Time your jumps perfectly so that you can jump each pillar without losing any time.
steps.content: Time your jumps perfectly so that you can jump each pillar without losing any time.

steps.title: As the Koopa Troopas approach you after the pillars, do not stop!
steps.content: As the Koopa Troopas approach you after the pillars, do not stop! Jump and use the blocks to ricochet yourself into hitting the 2nd Koopa Troopa. Do not slow down for this!

steps.title: Use the “Ricochet Jump” (see Technical Terms) to pass by the next few enemies you encounter.
steps.content: Use the “Ricochet Jump” (see Technical Terms) to pass by the next few enemies you encounter.

steps.title: To avoid the Piranha Plants, you must land exactly in front of or behind them yet still landing on the pipes.
steps.content: To avoid the Piranha Plants, you must land exactly in front of or behind them yet still landing on the pipes.

steps.title: Jump onto one of the ascending elevators and jump on top of what looks to be the ceiling (with all of the information at the top).
steps.content: Jump onto one of the ascending elevators and jump on top of what looks to be the ceiling (with all of the information at the top).

steps.title: Continue to run to the right and take the warp pipe to World 4.
steps.content: Continue to run to the right and take the warp pipe to World 4.

steps.title: Jump the first pipe and run under the first Spiny thrown by Lakitu.
steps.content: Jump the first pipe and run under the first Spiny thrown by Lakitu.

steps.title: It is important in this level to remember to not be tempted to stop for any coins or “?”
steps.content: It is important in this level to remember to not be tempted to stop for any coins or “?” blocks.

steps.title: It may be hard to believe but it is possible to make a “clean jump”** over the next Piranha Plants you see.
steps.content: It may be hard to believe but it is possible to make a “clean jump”** over the next Piranha Plants you see. Do not stop, if you time your jump perfectly you can jump from the ground clear over the plant.

steps.title: At the next gap, jump onto the bottom row of blocks and jump the next pipe.
steps.content: At the next gap, jump onto the bottom row of blocks and jump the next pipe.

steps.title: You must also make a “clean jump”** over the stack of 3 blocks that is somewhat of a wall before the last gap.
steps.content: You must also make a “clean jump”** over the stack of 3 blocks that is somewhat of a wall before the last gap.

steps.title: Finish the level by jumping up the large stack of blocks and jumping to the flag.
steps.content: Finish the level by jumping up the large stack of blocks and jumping to the flag. Ignore the brick below you when you jump.

steps.title: In one jump clear the first two gaps, land on the single space and immediately jump on top of the stack of bricks in front of you.
steps.content: In one jump clear the first two gaps, land on the single space and immediately jump on top of the stack of bricks in front of you. (be sure to land ON TOP of the stack)

steps.title: Next there are three Goombas, do a “ricochet jump” and land on the 2nd one, bouncing over the 3rd.
steps.content: Next there are three Goombas, do a “ricochet jump” and land on the 2nd one, bouncing over the 3rd.

steps.title: Jump between the four “?”
steps.content: Jump between the four “?” blocks and onto the moving elevators.

steps.title: From the elevator jump, hit the farthest left block in the row of three, causing a beanstalk to grow out of the block.
steps.content: From the elevator jump, hit the farthest left block in the row of three, causing a beanstalk to grow out of the block.

steps.title: While the plant is growing, position yourself directly below the rightmost block of the platform that the beanstalk is growing on and jump.
steps.content: While the plant is growing, position yourself directly below the rightmost block of the platform that the beanstalk is growing on and jump.

steps.title: Jump first on this stepping block you created and then to the platform the plant grew out of and climb the plant.
steps.content: Jump first on this stepping block you created and then to the platform the plant grew out of and climb the plant.

steps.title: In this special stage, you can collect the coins if you wish.
steps.content: In this special stage, you can collect the coins if you wish.

steps.title: Enter the warp pipe to warp to World 8.
steps.content: Enter the warp pipe to warp to World 8.

steps.title: Jump over the first Buzzy Beetle, then, immediately jump over the next 3 Goombas (Timing your first two jumps are an important factor in avoiding the plant that emerges from the tube).
steps.content: Jump over the first Buzzy Beetle, then, immediately jump over the next 3 Goombas (Timing your first two jumps are an important factor in avoiding the plant that emerges from the tube).

steps.title: After hopping over the first tube, immediately jump again to avoid the 2 turtles.
steps.content: After hopping over the first tube, immediately jump again to avoid the 2 turtles.

steps.title: There is no need to jump over the next 6 pits you encounter.
steps.content: There is no need to jump over the next 6 pits you encounter. You can simply run over them.

steps.title: Bypass the Piranha Plant in the next tube by leaping on the tube's edge and then immediately jumping again.
steps.content: Bypass the Piranha Plant in the next tube by leaping on the tube's edge and then immediately jumping again.

steps.title: The next tube can be leaped over normally.
steps.content: The next tube can be leaped over normally.

steps.title: You want to time your jump over the next tube to kill the second Goomba.
steps.content: You want to time your jump over the next tube to kill the second Goomba.

steps.title: Save time by avoiding the next four Koopa Troopas you see.
steps.content: Save time by avoiding the next four Koopa Troopas you see.

steps.title: After jumping over the first wall of blocks, immediately jump again to avoid the Koopa Paratroopa.
steps.content: After jumping over the first wall of blocks, immediately jump again to avoid the Koopa Paratroopa.

steps.title: Leap between the next two Koopa Paratroopas.
steps.content: Leap between the next two Koopa Paratroopas.

steps.title: You will come to three tubes separated by chasms.
steps.content: You will come to three tubes separated by chasms. The first two contain Piranha Plants. You will have to leap on to the edge of the second tube, and on to the third tube without a Piranha Plant.

steps.title: Leap off of the third tube to avoid four Buzzy Beetles.
steps.content: Leap off of the third tube to avoid four Buzzy Beetles.

steps.title: You will come to another chasm.
steps.content: You will come to another chasm. Carefully time your jump to land on the piece of land in the middle.

steps.title: Timing is even more key while performing the next jump you come to.
steps.content: Timing is even more key while performing the next jump you come to.

steps.title: Be careful to avoid falling into the pits.
steps.content: Be careful to avoid falling into the pits.

steps.title: As you climb the first rock tower, you will see two Koopa Troopas and a Lakitu.
steps.content: As you climb the first rock tower, you will see two Koopa Troopas and a Lakitu. Jump over the first Koopa and the Spiny thrown by Lakitu simultaneously and then immediately slip under the 2nd approaching Koopa Troopa.

steps.title: Once you reach the section of the level littered with cannons, the only way to continue at full speed is to stay above every cannon.
steps.content: Once you reach the section of the level littered with cannons, the only way to continue at full speed is to stay above every cannon. The trick is to land on top of as many as possible, avoiding every Bullet Bill.

steps.title: After the cannons you will be required to jump four tubes with Piranha Plants sticking out.
steps.content: After the cannons you will be required to jump four tubes with Piranha Plants sticking out. Timing is of the essence to ensure clearing each jump. The third large tube is placed after a huge ravine. Land in front of the tube and slow down slightly in order to perform a “clean jump”. This is the only part of the game that requires you to slow down!

steps.title: The final tricky part of this level occurs after this jump.
steps.content: The final tricky part of this level occurs after this jump. In order to clear a sequence of Koopa Troopas, it will be necessary to run under the first and then jump quickly to land on the single cannon while instantaneously jumping the gap immediately after it. (if you have trouble with this part, you can also take the warp tube to clear all the Koopas)

steps.title: The few enemies after this point can be ignored as they do not cross your path of movement.
steps.content: The few enemies after this point can be ignored as they do not cross your path of movement.

steps.title: Run up the block wall and grab the flag to end this level.
steps.content: Run up the block wall and grab the flag to end this level.

steps.title: Jump over obstacles normally executing a clean jump over the Piranha Plant.
steps.content: Jump over obstacles normally executing a clean jump over the Piranha Plant.

steps.title: The only way to clear the Hammer Brothers without slowing down is to perform a “ricochet jump” to kill the one on the bottom.
steps.content: The only way to clear the Hammer Brothers without slowing down is to perform a “ricochet jump” to kill the one on the bottom.

steps.title: Next you must clear the gap/block stack/gap combination in a single jump.
steps.content: Next you must clear the gap/block stack/gap combination in a single jump.

steps.title: At the next sighting of the Hammer Brothers, jump in between the two rows of bricks to safely run past them.
steps.content: At the next sighting of the Hammer Brothers, jump in between the two rows of bricks to safely run past them.

steps.title: At the third sighting of these annoying reoccurring Hammer Brothers, jump the first Hammer Brother and as the next Hammer Brother is in the air jump so that you can kill him mid-jump.
steps.content: At the third sighting of these annoying reoccurring Hammer Brothers, jump the first Hammer Brother and as the next Hammer Brother is in the air jump so that you can kill him mid-jump.

steps.title: When you land, immediately jump over the next tube with the Piranha Plant.
steps.content: When you land, immediately jump over the next tube with the Piranha Plant.

steps.title: At the final sighting of these persistent Hammer Brothers, you can simply jump the first and then immediately after, jump the second.
steps.content: At the final sighting of these persistent Hammer Brothers, you can simply jump the first and then immediately after, jump the second. Not a very challenging final attempt to stop you on their part!

steps.title: As soon as you land from jumping the second Hammer Brother, jump upon the stack of two blocks and then jump on the 2nd block that is in mid-air.
steps.content: As soon as you land from jumping the second Hammer Brother, jump upon the stack of two blocks and then jump on the 2nd block that is in mid-air.

steps.title: Finally jump to the last two which is a platform, jump down and grab the flag!
steps.content: Finally jump to the last two which is a platform, jump down and grab the flag!
